description:
Say "yes" to that winter hike invitation. The Chilkat V boot is waterproof and insulated for striding through powder and slush. The soles have temperature-sensitive lugs to provide solid footing while trekking along the Escarpment, doing a lap of your favorite snowshoe trail, or while shoveling your driveway.

  • Waterproof suede upper with flexible moulded TPU shell
  • Seam-sealed waterproof construction keeps feet dry
  • 200g Heatseeker™ Eco insulation keeps your feet toasty warm
  • Lace-up closure with gusseted tongue keeps snow out
  • Heel clip for snowshoe compatibility and d-ring gaiter attachment
  • Dual-density footbed is softer under forefoot and heels for comfort
  • Compression-moulded EVA midsole cushions impacts
  • Non-marking Surface CTRL™ rubber outsole offers grip and stability on snow and ice
name: The North Face Chilkat V Lace Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
